doc.title: Cool Dudes
doc.plot: It's wake-up time for the buff-boy stars of Baikal Films' latest amateur wrestling romp - COOL DUDES. The charming picturesque Ukrainian village in the Bukovina region is under a chilly blanket of ice and snow. That makes it a struggle for young brothers, Andrey and Ivan, to leave their warm bed and begin their morning routines. Across town, Nikolai and his cat, Koshka (kitten in Ukrainian), are still lazing in bed before starting their routines. Once all the boys join up at the competition hall, get ready for some serious sporting action. After the weigh-in, our muscular boys get ready to grapple for the championship title. Never a dull moment for anyone lucky enough to be watching these COOL DUDES!
